quotes.quote: Hollywood is a place where they'll pay you a thousand dollars for a kiss and fifty cents for your soul.
In Hollywood if you don't have a shrink, people think you're crazy.
Most of the successful people in Hollywood are failures as human beings.
What's the difference between Hollywood characters and my characters? Mine are real.
The classy gangster is a Hollywood invention.
The impact of the black audience is expressing itself. They look to films to be more expressive of their needs, their lives. Hollywood has gotten that message - finally.
You can think of Hollywood as high school. TV actors are freshmen, comedy actors are maybe juniors, and dramatic actors - they're the cool seniors.
In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
Hollywood has a way of making everything seem like an overnight success.
Romantic comedies seem to take over where the fairytales of childhood left off, feeding our dreams of a soulmate; though, sadly, the Hollywood endings prove quite elusive in the real world.
Behind the phony tinsel of Hollywood lies the real tinsel.
Hollywood is where they shoot too many pictures and not enough actors.
Hollywood hasn't changed. It is the most racist, anti-Indian institution in the world.
In Hollywood a girl's virtue is much less important than her hairdo.
The ladder of success in Hollywood is usually a press agent, actor, director, producer, leading man; and you are a star if you sleep with each of them in that order. Crude, but true.
Hollywood, what a place it is! It is so far away from the rest of the world, so narrow. No one thinks of anything but motion pictures or talks of anything else.
It is no surprise that animation is Hollywood's most successful and innovative genre.
Hollywood likes to put actors in boxes, and it likes to put Asian actors in really small boxes.
Hollywood is a strange place if you're in trouble. Everybody thinks it's contagious.
Certainly the attrition rate of Hollywood couples looms large.
If only those who dream about Hollywood knew how difficult it all is.
In Hollywood, no one knows anything.
Hollywood is an extraordinary kind of temporary place.
Liberals in Hollywood can't stand when Americans resonate to conservatives on television.
Like Hollywood movies, MTV and blue jeans, fast food has become one of America's major cultural exports.
In Hollywood the woods are full of people that learned to write but evidently can't read. If they could read their stuff, they'd stop writing. Will Rogers
In Hollywood you can see things at night that are fast enough to be in the Olympics in the day time.
